description:
Available languages: english - french 

Presentation: 

Warning, this game is planned for children, ryhtme is slow. There is easy and therefore unattractive to adults. 

Wolves for Kids is a game designed specially for young children. When a level is successful, your child wins a picture of a wolf. It can free up to 20 pictures through the 20 levels of play 

The difficulty is measured for the youngest! 

Game Type: casual game - skill game 

Your child will collect pictures of wolves in the various levels of play for children is Loupss

a game of skill where the child should touch the cards that turn before they disappear. 

Using the click screen in 20 levels suitable for children. 


Features: 

- Entertaining game on the theme of wolves 
-Three levels of difficulty (the hardest by default) 
- Intuitive control interface and clear 
- Automatic backup of progress. 
- Growth awarded 20 pictures of wolves in the collection available 
- 20 levels to accomplish 
- A simple game for younger where he can play without your help
